forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 52F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.
